root: ^There is nobody around... I deserve to take a small break, Ah all this excessive battling and working is making me so tired!
^How long has it been since I left home? I can't remember... I wish  I could just go back and hug Dad... if Mother was not there!
^Aaaaa! Makra! Please announce yourself when you're near someone!
^I have been with you for the last 15 minutes Claire, did you not notice me?
^Y... yes of course I saw you! Someone of my stature is always aware of their surroundings, how... how dare you think otherwise.
^Hihihi. No worries Claire. Anyway, I like to be able to blend in the shadows, it's something I have been training since childhood.
^You have been training to blend in with the shadows since childhood! My God, you must be lonely. Having no spotlight on you... that is something dreadful!
^Not really... I wish to impress my mother when I meet her again. This is the task of me and my siblings.
^Why would you want to impress your mother!? You should strive to be the greatest you for yourself not for her!
^I... well my mother is really powerful and I wish to be at her side in the future.
^sigh I guess we won't agree on that topic, family is a hard topic.
^Don't you have a family too? You were a Noble weren't you?
^I do not wish to talk about that topic! Now please leave me alone Makra.
^...I guess she's is not ready to talk about her past with me... but I wish this discussion didn't end on a sour note...
